teach2000.model

Class Overhoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • teach2000.model.Overhoring
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntwoordInvullen, MultipleChoice

    public abstract class Overhoring
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for tests. Contains all functionality to administrate a test. It closes off the access to the model members, but provides the necessary information to classes using it. A test is based around a List object. Questions will be provided in random order until their maximum score is reached. If all questions have reached their maximum score, null will be returned and the test_done variable will be set to true. A score is kept throughout the test, but isn't saved or written to disk. This is an abstract class and should be extended with test-specific functionality by using inheritance.
    Author:
    Kristof Buts

      • setNewQuestion

        public Question setNewQuestion()

        new Question object set, or null if they have all reached their maximum score

      • handleAnswer

        public boolean handleAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        The user's guess is passed in and passed on to the Question. The user will only know if it was right or wrong.
        Parameters:
        answer - String with the user's guess
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating correctness of the guess

      • correctAnswer

        private void correctAnswer()
        Private method for adjusting the test score. Score goes up by 5 if correct.

      • wrongAnswer

        private void wrongAnswer()
        Private method for adjusting the test score. Score goes down by 1 if incorrect.
